snippet: Logano secured the first berth in the next round of the Chase for the Sprint Cup, Nascar’s championship playoffs, with a victory at Kansas Speedway.
abstract: Joey Logano secures first berth in the next round of Chase for the Sprint Cup, Nascar’s championship playoffs, with a victory at Kansas Speedway; other auto racing news noted.
